text: Shanker Trivedi, Senior VP of Nvidia Global Field Operations, announced its collaboration with Yotta Infrastructure to establish an artificial intelligence (AI) data centre in Gujarat International Finance Tec-City (GIFT City) at the Vibrant Gujarat Summit.
